column1: Brazil have managed to secure their place in the last 16 after a hard-fought win. Casemiro's goal in the 83rd minute was the difference between the two sides
column2: after Vinicius' earlier effort was disallowed for offside. Switzerland put up a good fight
column3: but Brazil's superior quality in the attacking third eventually paid off. The Selecao are now through to the knockout stages
column4: while Switzerland will need to beat Serbia in their last game to join them.
